name: Riot of the numbers
description: Join the world of computer bits where only 0 and 1 are used but the other numbers felt left behind and they started a riot. You play as alpha 0 bit and try to reunite with alpha 1 bit to defeat the riot. Solve equations on each level while doing platforming to reach the exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp,7,8,8.1 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: any with direct X Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: xp,7,8,8.1 10 Processor: 2 Ghz core 2 duo Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: any with direct x Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: any
